column2: ggplot(agg_app_2016_2019_comparison_PA, aes(planning_area, customer_expectations_score,  fill=year), xlab="Age Group") + geom_bar(stat="identity", position="dodge", width=.6) + scale_x_discrete(labels=abbreviate) + geom_text(aes(label=round(customer_expectations_score, 1)), vjust=0, size=3) + labs(title="Comparison of Customer Expectation Scores (Taxi/Car Booking App) from 2016 to 2019")
